name: Gremolata
description: You'd be hard pressed to find a garnish simpler, prettier, or more flavorful than this. The combination of chopped parsley, lemon zest, and garlic is good on nearly any meat or fish. The sharpness of raw garlic paired with lemon zest's slight bitterness makes gremolata a perfect topping to cut through the heaviness of fatty meats and heavy stews.

recipeInstructions.text: In a small bowl mix together parsley, garlic, and lemon zest. Use immediately.
